transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji madam. Hello

Customer: Ji

Executive: Hello boliye sunaiye. Ji

Customer: Ji sir Royal Ruby tea nagar ko baat ho rahi hai.

Executive: Ji ji. Main Mahadev bol raha hu boliye madam.

Customer: Ji sir main aaj hi baat kar rahi thi sir India Mart se sir abhi kya issue aa raha hai aap active nahi hai India Mart se.

Executive: Ji main madam aapne do ek baar phone kiya tha humko hum kuch bahar the isliye aapka phone theek se proper receive nahi kar paye. Achcha madam abhi humko jo issue aa raha hai. Ek minute sir aapki aawaz dheemi aa rahi hai. Ek second ek second ek second.

Customer: Ji sir aap bataiye.

Executive: Madam aisa hai ki main mera jo India Mart pe jo hum check kar rahe hain na madam.

Customer: Ji. Yaha pe jo jo mera buyer jo inquiry kar rahe hain na wo sab humko jo category aa raha hai ye loose tea ka aa raha hai matlab jaise 35 kilo ka 38 kilo ka jo bora hai bahut bada.

Customer: Us type ka bhi inquiry aa raha hai humko actually mein packet tea ka hum log jo category hai usme aate hain us regarding mere pass jyada lead nahi aa raha hai.

Customer: Ji sir. Sir Royal main baat kar rahi thi sir aapka naam kya hoga?

Executive: Company ka naam hai Royal Ruby aur mera naam hai Mahadev.

Customer: Okay okay Mahajan.

Executive: Mahadev. Sir aapka sir aapke Mahadev okay theek hai. To sir jaise ki main dekh. Mahadev.

Customer: Ji ji ji. To jaise ki main dekh pa rahi hu sir aap kafi time se inactive hai hai na. To main aapko yahi bol rahi thi ki aap thoda sa active ho jaiye platform pe aur agar koi issue aa raha hai buyleads wagera mein aur inquiry jaise aap bata rahe ho ki aapki inquiry aati hai bas hai na. Matlab wo mature nahi ho rahi hai leads right.

Yahi bata rahe ho na aap sir.

Executive: Main bata raha hu ki mera lead aana chahiye jaise hamara jo category hai hum log packet tea jar mein jo ready tea hai wo hum log karte hain na sell. Hanji.
Ab yaha pe jo mere pass lead aa raha hai ye loose tea ka lead aa raha hai jaise kisi ko bag chahiye 35 kilo ka. To aapko jo lead aa rahi hai wo relevant nahi aa rahi hai jo aapka product hai usse related nahi aa rahi hai yahi aa raha hai. Haan.
Ye relevant relevant nahi aa raha hai madam.

Customer: Okay okay okay bas main ek second sir pehle main check kar leti hu ek bari. Hmm hmm.

Executive: Madam agar direct humko aap se contact karna ho to kaise karenge?

Customer: Sir same number hai na aapne sir jis number pe call kiya tha isse pehle bhi mere pass phone aaya tha aapka but actually main meeting mein thi to main aapko call back nahi kar payi thi maine abhi kiya hai. Aap mere isi number pe call back kar sakte hain. Ravi ji wala jo phone number hai wo aapke pass hi hai na ye?

Executive: Kaunsa sir?

Customer: Ravi. Ravi ji aapka Ravi Ravi. Iska naam le rahe ho aap? Wo ye manager. Achcha pehle achcha jo pehle honge sir aapke Ravi ji manager abhi sir aapke account manager main hu. To aapko koi bhi issue problem ho to aap humko call kar sakte hain. Buyleads.

Executive: Ye number pe? Haan to sir agar.

Customer: Haan same number pe sir same number main aapko whatsapp pe bhej dungi ek bari aapka number theek hai. Sir Ruby tea aapka jo hai wo hai Ruby tea Ruby masala chai hai na. Ji.
Thik hai thik hai. Uski leads aapko nahi aa rahi hai. Ji ji madam.
Aur aapko kuch aur leads aa rahe hain pata bata rahe ho. Malda West Bengal black tea ya something sab tea ka hai black tea. To kya issue aa raha hai sir tea type aapko aa raha hai lekin same nahi aa raha hai product right?

Executive: Jaise mam agar main buyleads check karke agar main recent wala mein jata hu na madam. Dekhiye isme mujhe dikha hai BOP. But hum log BOP to nahi sell karte hum log sell karte hain ready tea jaise CTC ho gaya black tea ho gaya masala chai ho gaya elaichi chai ho gaya ye hum log sell karte hain. Hmm.
To is regarding mere pass koi requirement nahi hai dekhiye. Ye BOP aaya hai CTC mein ye bhi aaya hai BOP green tea mein fir bhi BOP CTC ye hum log nahi sell karte dekhiye madam in logo ka value bhi dikha hai ye log ka kilo ke hisab se chahiye 200 se 300 ka kilo hum log actually packet tea jo hai wo sell karte hain mera catalog aapke samne hoga dekh pa rahe hain hum. Hmm.

Customer: Ji. Ji ji main dekh pa rahi hu main dekh pa rahi hu. Aapka overall sir ye bata rahe ho aap black. Ji ji ji bataiye.

Executive: Mera mujhe jo matlab mera jo buyer hai na unka mujhe pass koi lead nahi aa raha hai. Haan.
Packet tea kharidne wale ka koi lead nahi aa raha hai mujhe. Aapke jo buyer hai.
Achcha sir aap seller ho ya buyer ho?

Executive: Main seller hu.

Customer: Hai na aap seller ho to aapko jo aage se leads aa rahi hai wo log bhi seller hi wo log bhi seller aisa bolna chahte ho kya aap?

Executive: Nahi madam. Jaise ab wo log usko leke kya karenge pata nahi humko lekin aisa hai ki jaise main 100 gram ka packet banata hu na aur main wo sell karta hu. Haan ji. Hmm.
Ab mere pass jo inquiry aa raha hai unko chahiye teen 30 kg 100 gram mein 30 kg chahiye unko wo bhi. Okay wahi wahi wahi sir main bol rahi hu ki jo aapke pass aapka concern ye hai ki aapka jo product hai usse related leads aapko nahi aa rahi hai aapko kuch aur aa raha hai right?

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Ji main wahi dekh rahi thi sir main bas wahi bata rahi hu aapko ki aapka jo product hai wo hai pehli baat aapka tea theek hai hum maan lete hain sir wo premium dust tea pouch usse ki matlab nahi aapka jo hai masala masala tea hai tea hai aur. Hmm.
Jar ka tea hai hai na. To isse sir koi issue nahi hai aap jo buyleads aapko aa rahe hain unko aap consume kar sakte hain aur unko aap apne product ke bare mein theek se bata sakte hain ki aapka product ye hai itna achcha hai ye. Aise to sir nahi bolte honge na wo log ki humko aapke brand ki tea chahiye jo humne brand dala hai wahi chahiye mujhe aise to nahi bolte na.

Executive: Nahi actually dekhiye madam agar wo log mera jaise 100 gram ka packet hai ya fir 1 kilo ka packet hai ye regarding agar wo log koi query karte hain na to main unko call back kar sakta hu. Lekin abhi mujhe aa raha hai jo main product bechta nahi hu us regarding mere pass aa raha hai. Achcha achcha achcha to sir aapka black tea ka to hai na sir black tea to aapke pass hai na?

Executive: Nahi black tea ka hai lekin jaise hum log ka hum log loose tea sell nahi karte madam loose tea nahi karte hum log packet tea karte hain inko jo requirement hai ye log loose tea ke liye requirement dal rahe hain. Achcha requirement dal rahe hain loose tea ke liye sir itna sa requirement dala nahi hai inhone inhone log ne dala hai black tea to kafi dekh rahi hu main black tea to kafi aa rakha hai aapke pass. Flavored tea black tea black tea black tea to black tea to apne pass hai sir to usko aap consume kar sakte ho aaram se. Thik hai. Ab main dekh leti hu main ek bari aapko connect kar leti hu sir video meet pe kal thik hai aap mere ko time bata do to main aapko kal connect kar leti hu video meet pe aur hum aapko isko ek ek karke main aapko explain kar dungi guide kar dungi sir thik hai.

Executive: Thik hai madam kal mujhe aap phone kijiye na 12 baje phone. Thik hai.

Customer: Kal abhi haan 12 baje tak main call karti hu sir aapko aur main isko explain kar deti hu aapko kaise kya aapko bas yahi sir aapko yahi concern hai na bas aapko koi concern to nahi hai na sir isme aapko issue aa raha ho. Baki koi concern nahi hai madam. Ji.
Ji sir buyleads aap kafi time se use kar rahe hain aapne last buyleads use ki hai 26 October ko ki hai pura November beet gaya sir aapne ek bhi buyleads use nahi ki. Thik hai. Madam us us regarding aa nahi raha hai isliye. Ji ji ji main samajh pa rahi hu sir aap mere ko call kar lete main bas fir itni baar call ki aapka phone nahi uth raha tha. Thik hai. To abhi hum isse kal sir explain kar dungi main aapko kaise kaise kya karna hai guide kar dungi thik hai.

Executive: Ji madam.

Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai okay sir thank you.

Executive: Thik hai thik hai welcome madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer is inactive on the platform.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect on video meet tomorrow.

- Executive will guide the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer by 12:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product category, relevance
